tools.title: Codepen
tools.description: Test your front-end code snippets, or discover cool effects and components.

tools.title: Omatsuri
tools.description: Discover lots of awesome tools, ranging from Lorem Ipsum generators to Gradient generators

tools.title: Haikei
tools.description: Generate unique SVG design assets, ready to use with your design tools and workflow.

tools.title: Font Flipper
tools.description: Find your perfect match! Swipe through fonts until you find the perfect font combination.

tools.title: ColorSpace
tools.description: Enter a color, and this site will generate you a long list of fitting color pallets.

tools.title: Adobe Colors
tools.description: Create your own color pallet with ease.

tools.title: Gradient Magic
tools.description: This site offers a variety of awesome gradient effects.

tools.title: UI Gradients
tools.description: Browse through lots of different gradients.

tools.title: Cubic Bezier
tools.description: Create the perfect Cubic Bezier curve for your CSS animations.

tools.title: Bundlephobia
tools.description: Anxious about how large all your NPM packages are ? Find out how massive these packages really are.

tools.title: Image Color Picker
tools.description: Upload an Image and pick your color, or create a color palette from the image.

resources.title: The Odin Project
resources.description: Free courses to learn Full Stack. Either in Ruby or JS.

resources.title: Free Code Camp
resources.description: Free Courses for many Topics, ranging from Web to Machine Learning.

resources.title: Leetcode
resources.description: Solve programming challenges in a lot of different programming languages.

resources.title: Advent of Code
resources.description: An annual programming competition to solve 25 challenging christmas themed puzzles.

resources.title: CSS Battle
resources.description: Compete to recreate Pictures with only HTML/CSS.

resources.title: First Timers Only
resources.description: Learn how to contribute to Open Source Projects, and find your first project to contribute to.

resources.title: Frontend Mentor
resources.description: Polish your Frontend Skills by recreating components and pages.

resources.title: Frontend Practice
resources.description: A curated List of Websites for you to recreate to improve CSS skills.
